== Getting the Source Code ==

<code>svn checkout http://hopmod.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ hopmod </code>

== Dependencies ==

** Linux or FreeBSD<br>
** GeoIp C library ( [http://www.maxmind.com/app/c Download] )<br>
** SQLite3 C library ( [http://www.sqlite.org/download.html Download] )<br>
** Boost C++ Libraries ( [http://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=7586&package_id=8041&release_id=619445 Download] ) (only headers)<br>
** mpl<br>
** type_traits<br>
** function<br>
** bind<br>
** shared_ptr<br>
** libmicrohttpd ( [ftp://ftp.gnu.org/gnu/libmicrohttpd/libmicrohttpd-0.3.1.tar.gz Download] )<br>

=== Perl Modules used by the IRC Bot ===

==Base Bot==
** LWP::UserAgent<br>
** HTTP::Request<br>
** Config::Auto<br>
** POE::Component::IRC::State<br>
** POE::Component::IRC::Plugin::Connector<br>
** POE::Component::IRC::Plugin::AutoJoin<br>
** POE::Component::IRC::Plugin::FollowTail<br>

==Player Locator Module==
** IO::Socket<br>
** threads<br>
** threads::shared<br>
** LWP::Simple<br>

=== PHP Scoreboard ===

** PHP 5<br>
** PHP PDO Sqlite Module<br>

=== Patches ===

** bin/patcher.php requires PHP 5.

== Compiling the Server ==

Enter the src directory and run the make program, that's it, no configure script is provided unfortunately. Output files are written to the <tt>"../bin"</tt> directory.

<code>
cd src
make
</code>

== Starting the Server ==

<code>bin/serverctl start</code>

== Stopping the Server ==

<code>bin/serverctl stop</code>
